segments.text: I see the woman drying that plate, and I can’t help but laugh.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s so focused on her task that she doesn’t even notice the water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies, and she has no clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is practically doing a circus act to reach that jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he’s ever going to fall or if he’s just that good at balancing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her treat like it’s the most normal thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm the woman is while everything is falling apart around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, but inside, it’s a comedy of errors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to have a big surprise when she finally turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is so ridiculous that I can’t help but smile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the kids are going to get away with it or if the woman will catch them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Either way, it’s going to be entertaining to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
